name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Fullstack Engineer with 10+ years of experience delivering high-performance software solutions, specializing in **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, and modern microservices architectures. Proficient in **microservices** and **event-driven** systems, skilled in designing and implementing **RESTful APIs** and applying **CQRS** and **DDD** principles. Expertise includes crafting dynamic user experiences using **React Query** and **Context API**, as well as styling through **Tailwind CSS**. Experienced in deploying applications using **Docker** and automating workflows with **CI/CD** processes. Strong background in managing observability and performance with **Prometheus** and **Splunk**. Furthermore, proficient in working with SQL databases to ensure robust data management.

Bringing hands-on expertise across the full stack with a strong command of **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Proven history of leading enterprise platform development with embedded AI/ML capabilities for intelligent decision-making. Committed to building secure, maintainable solutions aligned with compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Passionate about creating systems that are not only technically adept but also have a tangible impact on business outcomes.
